examples.example: 我加快脚步，走到了队伍的前边，准备带领大家前进。

translate.english: I quickened my pace and walked to the front of the team, ready to lead everyone forward.

examples.example: 他在前边为我们引路，让我们能轻松找到目的地。

translate.english: He leads the way in front of us, so that we can easily find the destination.

examples.example: 小朋友们欢快地跑在前边，笑声回荡在整个公园。

translate.english: The children are running merrily in the front and the laughter reverberates throughout the whole park.
